title: Read the problem.
text: Make sure all the words and ideas are understood. Draw a diagram to illustrate what is happening.

title: Identify and name what we're looking for
text: We are asked to find the speed of Kathy and Cheryl. Take the speed of Cheryl to be r and $$r+2$$ to be the speed of Kathy

title: Translate into an equation
text: Restate what we know about the rates, time, and distance into an equation. $$4.8\left(r+2\right)=8r$$
